DataElementConcept.preferredName: Household Survey Prior To Child Diagnosis Struggle with Rent or Mortgage Due to Financial Difficulties
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes._A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.:Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._A question about whether an individual struggled with rent or mortgage due to financial difficulties.
